description.value:
You are skilled at putting the weight of a weapon to your advantage. While you are wielding a melee weapon with the two-handed property with which you are proficient, you gain the following benefits:

  • When you roll a 1 or 2 on a weapon damage die, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or 2.
  • Grasping a two-handed weapon you are wielding in only one hand with your other hand no longer requires your object interaction.
